text: Kirova () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Yalchinsky Selsoviet, Kugarchinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 11 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 47 km from Mrakovo, 9 km from Yalchino. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kugarchinsky District
title: Kirova, Republic of Bashkortostan
